ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars - Saga
ygData.msgSnippet: Thecode, you never emailed me about your moding spree. Also, there was no possible way of your chars going through that far without severe moding on your part.

Thecode, you never emailed me about your moding spree. Also, there was no 
possible way of your chars going through that far without severe moding on 
your part. But as KSLawdogg pointed out, if RgDaN modes, it doesn't mean you 
can mode. He has been spoken to, and is almost as close as you to being 
moderated. You can play out your storylines as long as they arn't filled with 
moding. So stop arguing and start RPGing. If you have further arguments, send 
them to me.
